tool_description: Creates comprehensive client profiles including preferences, style requirements, and special requests for wedding and event photography services.

client_name.description: Full name of the primary client

event_type.description: Type of event (wedding, engagement, corporate, birthday, anniversary)

photography_style.description: Preferred photography style (traditional, photojournalistic, fine_art, vintage, modern)

error_messages: Invalid event type: Use one of [wedding, engagement, corporate, birthday, anniversary]
Invalid photography style: Use one of [traditional, photojournalistic, fine_art, vintage, modern]
Invalid budget range: Use one of [budget, mid_range, premium, luxury]
Empty client name: Provide a valid client name
usage: Provide client_name, event_type, photography_style, and budget_range. Optionally include special_requirements array. Creates a structured profile for future reference.

profile_id.description: Unique identifier for the client profile

client_summary.description: Summary of client preferences and requirements

style_notes.description: Detailed notes about photography style preferences
